The 2018 Brazilian Music Awards (), the 29th edition of the ceremony, was held at the Theatro Municipal in Rio de Janeiro on 15 August 2018. The ceremony was hosted by actresses Camila Pitanga and Débora Bloch, and was broadcast on Canal Brasil and YouTube. Luiz Melodia was honored at the ceremony.
Winners and nominees
The nominees were announced on 17 July 2018. Winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
